channel.name: Douse in Slime (Slime Boss card) - Daily Discussion 6 Feb

messages.content: Previous Daily Discussion: #deleted-channel

Next Daily Discussion: #deleted-channel

__Votes__:
Optimize (Automaton card): 3
Steel Edge (Champ card): 1
Multi-Beam (Guardian card): 5
Daily Discussion 110/782

embeds.title: Douse in Slime
embeds.description:
Rare Skill / 3 (2) :e_slime: / The Slime Boss / Downfall

Apply 14 **Goop** :p_goop:.
The next Attack used on this enemy does not remove **Goop** :p_goop:.

messages.content: Well, it's certainly goopy. It's pretty good for those turns where the enemy isn't going to attack you or anything.

itâ€™s like double goop
also apparently synergizes with <equalize slime boss>

embeds.title: Equalize
embeds.description:
Uncommon Attack / 2 :e_slime: / The Slime Boss / Downfall

Deal 8 (12) damage.
Heal 4 (6) HP.
**Consume** - Play this twice.
**Exhaust**.

messages.content: But other wise, I find this card difficult to use due to the cost.
i only play it via dead branch mostly
If I get this through Dead Branch, that's a rough pick.
slime boss dead branch has insane efficiency due to lick generation tho
you can afford to play high cost cards because of that
yeah but dead branch sucks
<consume doesn't remove goop>

embeds.title: Slime Slap
embeds.description:
Rare Attack / 2 (1) :e_slime: / The Slime Boss / Downfall

Deal 8 damage.
**Consume** - Does not remove **Goop** :p_goop:.

footer.text: <consume doesnt remove goop> = slime slap, 43% sure

messages.content: Imo those two are pretty much the same card
At least in practice
One is a skill, the other one is an attack, they have different cost and damage but they function pretty much the same
One thing douse in slime has over slime slap is that it allows you to get benefits from any two consume cards which increases the utility of it
So usually DiS is the better option
<leaching strike>

embeds.title: Leeching Strike
embeds.description:
Common Attack / 1 :e_slime: / The Slime Boss / Downfall

Deal 5 (8) damage.
**Consume** - Gain **Block** :p_block: equal to the enemy's **Goop** :p_goop:.

messages.content: <Slime boss attack heal rare>

embeds.title: Leech Life
embeds.description:
Rare Attack / 2 :e_slime: / The Slime Boss / Downfall

**Ethereal**.
Deal 8 (10) damage. Heal HP equal to unblocked damage.
**Exhaust**.

footer.text: <slime boss attack heal rare> = leech life, 76% sure

messages.content: Those two are probably the best candidates for pairing with DiS as they both benefit from using up large amounts of goop at a time
<dead branch>

embeds.title: Dead Branch
embeds.description:
Rare Relic / All / Slay the Spire

Whenever you **Exhaust** a card, add a random card into your hand.
*The branch of a tree from a forgotten era.*

messages.content: I feel slime boss doesn't generally play well with dead branch. I might pick it in the early stages though
I only pick douse in slime when it is close to the end of act 3 AND I do not have much attack cards in my deck AND I do not have enough growth to kill the boss
dead branch honestly just removes consistency from your deck, and I dislike it for the same reason that I dislike snecko
Other than hexaghost slime boss gets the most out of dead branch considering about half of his card pool exhausts
And getting any of the licks is just free damage
It makes <tongue lash>/<waste not> significantly stronger

embeds.title: Tongue Lash
embeds.description:
Uncommon Attack / 1 :e_slime: / The Slime Boss / Downfall

Deal 6 damage. Deals 2 (3) additional damage for each **Exhaust**ed card containing "Lick".

embeds.title: Waste Not
embeds.description:
Rare Skill / 2 :e_slime: / The Slime Boss / Downfall

**Exhume** all Lick cards.
~~- **Exhaust**. -~~

messages.content: i feel waste not actually gets weaker with dead branch tbh
itâ€™s mostly a matter of waste not exhuming even normal licks which can flood your discard
unless you kill during that deck cycle
and it will add in more random unupgraded licks
from dead branch
I just think that dead branch sucks and is my actively least favorite relic in the game
I thought that the limit to how many licks it can bring back is your hand size
no if you have lick generating cards it just mills the rest
Strange
Wait no cause exhume brings then into your hand right I could've sworn they just cap at hand size
Maybe I'm bugging
itâ€™s been a while since I played slime boss so idk
maybe something changed since then
but waste not always flooded me with normal licks which is why i never picked it unless i never took lick generating cards
its not all for one
makes sense for all for one not to do it cause why show things moving from discard to discard
meanwhile <just desserts> and <recollect> donâ€™t do that they prio the unique licks

embeds.title: Just Desserts
embeds.description:
Uncommon Attack / 1 :e_slime: / The Slime Boss / Downfall

Deal 6 (8) damage to ALL enemies.
**Exhume** 2 (3) random Lick cards.

embeds.title: Recollect
embeds.description:
Uncommon Skill / 1 :e_slime: / The Slime Boss / Downfall

Gain 8 (11) **Block** :p_block:.
**Exhume** a random Lick card.

messages.content: <Buried keyword> doesnâ€™t apply for waste not tho

embeds.title: Buried
embeds.description:
Keyword / Downfall

Buried cards will always be chosen last for random Exhume effects.

messages.content: because it is not random
true

In a lick deck, unless you find waste not early, you typically will have both lick generation <schlurp> for example and exhume licks, which will eventually end up with normal licks being at the top of your exhaust and then when you waste not you only get those, which is pretty meh most of the time

embeds.title: Schlurp
embeds.description:
Common Skill / 1 :e_slime: / The Slime Boss / Downfall

Gain 6 **Block** :p_block:.
Gain 2 (3) Licks.

messages.content: and then the rest of your licks will be milled and destroy your next cycle
so either you get waste not early so you can build around it (but it will be a brick before you take and upgrade a number of good licks)
or you play it early before your exhausted licks start to mill
actually I guess dead branch makes it better because at least the licks will generate a random card for you
instead of being mostly dead
Just get a toxic egg in act one 🤓
I mean i don't really like normal lick cards anyways
The special licks are insane to chain though
